item.title: U.S. SEC Confirms PoW Crypto Mining Doesn’t Fall Under Securities Laws
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has clarified that proof-of-work (PoW) crypto mining does not trigger securities laws. In a staff statement published on March 20, the SEC’s Division of Corporation Finance confirmed that mining activities, whether solo or in pools are not investment contracts under the Howey Test.
